title: Deffinitions
content:
HTML:Hypertext Markup Language
The formatting language for the web, used to define the content of a web page.

URI/URL: Uniform resource Identifier
An "address" that is unique & used to identify each resource on the web. 

HTTP: Hypertext transfer protocols 
Allows for the retrieval of linked resources from the web.  

CSS: Cascading Style Sheets
Used to specify the layout of a web page. 

JavaScript: A scripting language, usually embedded in the html used to add interactivity.   

Var: keyword to declare variables.
